metadata.title: CVE-2020-16124 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in the XML RPC library ofOpenRobotics ros_comm communications packages allows unauthenticatednetwork traffic to cause unexpected behavior. This issue affects:OpenRobotics ros_comm communications packages Noetic and prior versions.Fixed in https://github.com/ros/ros_comm/pull/2065.

criterions.comment: ros-ros-comm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
